item.title: Want to Learn From Palantir Co-Founder Peter Thiel? Listen to Him Talk About the Antichrist
item.description: Peter Thiel will be giving a four-part lecture series on the Antichrist. It could serve as a devilishly useful primer on the investor’s worldview.

item.title: Instagram Finally Gave Us an iPad App. It’s Not What Anyone Asked For
item.description: Instagram users aren’t happy with the apps insistence on making you start with Reels.

item.title: How De’Longhi Dodged Tariffs by Labeling Its Coffee Machine as a Computer
item.description: It’s a bold strategy to take when considering the high penalties companies face if they get caught knowingly underpaying a duty.

item.title: Sexual Harassment Still Plagues the Workplace. Here’s How to Fight Back
item.description: When it comes to combating upsetting office interactions, research says you could learn from your female staff.

item.title: After Months of Worry Over Tariffs, Business Owners Now Feel More Confident
item.description: New surveys find entrepreneurs cautiously optimistic about their business prospects and the economy.
